sentence: 4 |||  ||| 0.4 ||| We aimed to assess endothelin-1 (ET-1), a potent melanocyte mitogen, in plasma of PUVA-treated paients with vitiligo.

label: pr.SS

sentence: 6 |||  ||| 0.6 ||| ET-1 was sequentially assessed (using ELISA) in patients with nonsegmental vitiligo treated with PUVA (n ¼ 20), at 8, 16 and 24 h following the PUVA session.

sentence: 26 ||| Introduction ||| 1.9 ||| All patients received 3 sessions ⁄ week of systemic PUVA therapy in the form of oral 8-methoxypsoralen (0.6 mg ⁄ kg) followed after 2 h by UVA exposure (300-400 nm, Waldmann, Schwenningen, Germany) according to the United States Cooperative Clinical Trial protocol, and all patients completed the 3-month therapy period.
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 26 ||| Introduction ||| 1.9 ||| All patients received 3 sessions ⁄ week of systemic PUVA therapy in the form of oral 8-methoxypsoralen (0.6 mg ⁄ kg) followed after 2 h by UVA exposure (300-400 nm, Waldmann, Schwenningen, Germany) according to the United States Cooperative Clinical Trial protocol, and all patients completed the 3-month therapy period.

sentence: 46 ||| Discussion ||| 3.2 ||| Pretreatment plasma ET-1 levels in vitiligo and psoriasis were found to be elevated above the values of healthy controls in this current study and even above those reported in the literature (2.3-4 pg ⁄ mL).
content: plasma ET-1 levels in vitiligo and psoriasis were found to be elevated above the values of healthy controls in this current study
label: o.Treatment

sentence: 62 ||| Discussion ||| 3.18 ||| In addition, there was a significant indirect correlation between sequential plasma ET-1 and VASI score, indicating that the elevation of plasma ET-1 in response to PUVA therapy is accompanied by generalized hyperpigmentation and repigmentation of vitiligo.
content: the elevation of plasma ET-1 in response to PUVA therapy is accompanied by generalized hyperpigmentation and repigmentation of vitiligo
label: o.Treatment

sentence: 65 ||| Discussion ||| 3.21 ||| Having accepted that hyperproliferating keratinocytes and endothelial cells are the main sources of the elevation, it is likely that the decline in ET-1 is the result rather than the cause of the improvement.
content: it is likely that the decline in ET-1 is the result
label: o.Treatment
